title: Object initially at rest four forces

content.question: Four different constant forces are exerted on a <math alttext="2.0 kilogram" overflow="scroll"><mtext>2.0 kg</mtext></math> object. The figure represents the magnitude and direction of each force. If the object is initially at rest, how long will it take the object to reach a speed of <math alttext="2.0 meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mtext>2.0 m/s</mtext></math>?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
